entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish Blazor WASM application to Azure App service fails #39869
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39867
  • Error compiling release version in Xamarin UWP #39866
  • PageRemote attribute has a bug #39864
  • With .NET 7 SDK, the docs link should be updated when creating mvc/razor project in CLI #39862
  • Developers can easily work with JWT bearer authentication for API apps during development #39857
  • Async minimal route handlers don't serialize child members #39856
  • Simplify Authentication and Authorization configuration when using WebApplicationBuilder #39855
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Areas for Blazor #39854

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #39828
  • Non bubbled event from custom element doesn't reach the Blazor handler #39831
  • Review NPM distribution files #39829
  • Minimal Actions - array support in method signatures from querystring binding #32516
    17.1-Preview1
  • Minimal APIs doesn't support binding to StringValues from query or headers #36726
    17.1-Preview1
  • Missing fractional seconds of date-time in ModelBinding #37590
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .net Blazor markup "if" code compiles and executes dispite being bad written #39824

PullRequests

Created

  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) on ConnectionMultiplexerFactory #39865
    community-contribution
  • chore (codespaces) : Use latest omnisharp build #39861
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39859
    area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • Consistently serialize child members returned from route handlers #39858
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove static char arrays #39863
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Use non-generic TaskCompletionSource #39835
    area-mvc, area-runtime, area-signalr, area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39842
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Added support for arrays of types with TryParse, StringValues and string[] for query strings and headers #39809
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Fork component analyzers #39796
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Do not upgrade warnings to errors in VS #39845
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
